news.title: Chhattisgarh High Court Implements Forest Conservation Guidelines
news.content: The Chhattisgarh High Court has issued comprehensive guidelines for forest conservation and tribal rights protection, emphasizing sustainable development in forest areas while safeguarding indigenous communities' interests.

news.title: Mining Operations Environmental Compliance Mandated
news.content: The court has directed strict environmental compliance measures for mining operations in Chhattisgarh, including mandatory environmental impact assessments and community consultation processes.

news.title: Digital Court System Launch in Rural Areas
news.content: Chhattisgarh High Court announces the launch of digital court systems in rural areas to improve access to justice for tribal and rural populations across the state.
